content.html:
External Flash Units

Using an External Flash


2 In shooting mode, select FLASH
FUNCTION SETTING in the そ (FLASH
SETTING) menu tab. The options
available vary with the flash unit.


MenuDescription
EF-X8Displayed when an optional EF-X8 flash unit is mounted on the hot shoe and raised.268
SYNC TERMINALAdjust settings for flash units connected via the sync terminal. SYNC TERMINAL is displayed if the EF-X8 is lowered and either no flash unit, or an incompatible flash unit, is mounted on the hot shoe.270
SHOE MOUNT FLASHDisplayed when an optional flash unit other than the EF-X8 is mounted on the hot shoe and turned on.271
COMMANDER (OPTICAL)Displayed if an optional flash unit functioning as a com- mander for Fujifilm optical wireless remote flash control is connected and turned on.274
1 Connect the unit to the camera.

3 Highlight items using the focus stick
(focus lever) and rotate the front
command dial to change the high-
lighted setting.



4 Press DISP/BACK to put the changes into effect.

and

content.markdown:
External Flash Units

# Using an External Flash

- 1 Connect the unit to the camera.


2 In shooting mode, select FLASH
FUNCTION SETTING in the そ (FLASH
SETTING) menu tab. The options
available vary with the flash unit.

![image](/image/placeholder)
↓ FLASH SETTING
I.Q. FLASH FUNCTION SETTING
AF RED EYE REMOVAL
MF
TTL-LOCK MODE
LED LIGHT SETTING
COMMANDER SETTING
CH SETTING
MY
BACK EXIT

| Menu | Description |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| EF-X8 | Displayed when an optional EF-X8 flash unit is mounted on the hot shoe and raised. | 268 |
| SYNC TERMINAL | Adjust settings for flash units connected via the sync terminal. SYNC TERMINAL is displayed if the EF-X8 is lowered and either no flash unit, or an incompatible flash unit, is mounted on the hot shoe. | 270 |
| SHOE MOUNT FLASH | Displayed when an optional flash unit other than the EF-X8 is mounted on the hot shoe and turned on. | 271 |
| COMMANDER (OPTICAL) | Displayed if an optional flash unit functioning as a com- mander for Fujifilm optical wireless remote flash control is connected and turned on. | 274 |


3 Highlight items using the focus stick
(focus lever) and rotate the front
command dial to change the high-
lighted setting.

![image](/image/placeholder)
MODE
EF-X8
TTL ±0 -2.0 I
+2.0
TTL MODE 红TL SYNC. FRONT
ZOOM ANGLE
ADJUST BACK END

- 4 Press DISP/BACK to put the changes into effect.


Peripherals
and
Optional
Accessories

10

267
